alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; Southeast Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 21 at 11:41PM MDT until October 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Paradox Valley/Lower Dolores River and Four Corners/Upper Dolores River. In Utah, Southeast Utah, Arches/Grand Flat and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. * WHEN...From 10 AM Saturday to midnight MDT Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges; Southeast Utah
